mapper.select: SELECT mf.id AS id, mf.frame_type_code AS frame_type_code, mf.material_id AS material_id, mf.priority_level AS priority_level, mf.create_time AS create_time, m.product_no as material_code, m.product_name as material_name, m.id as material_id FROM md_product_frame mf LEFT JOIN md_product_packaging m ON mf.material_id = m.id WHERE mf.material_code =#{materialCode} and mf.frame_type_code IN ( SELECT type_code FROM md_frame f LEFT JOIN md_area a ON f.area_id=a.id LEFT JOIN md_ware w ON w.id=a.ware_id WHERE 1=1 AND w.code LIKE concat('%', #{wareCode}, '%') )
